definition[0]: an event such as a musical performance which you can listen to or watch on the Internet
definition[1]: to broadcast an event on the Internet, at the time the event happens
example[0]: Various local news sites plan to webcast each of the mayoral debates.
definition[2]: an event that is broadcast on the Internet as it is happening
example[1]: There will be a live webcast of the total solar eclipse.
definition[3]: to broadcast an event on the Internet, at the time the event is happening
